page.title: 01Coatbridge
page.content: {Coatbridge}is a town within a rural landscape. Not too busy or noisy. Those not born or married into the town, chose to live here because of the environment and because all areas are convenient for schools, churches , shopping,sport and entertainment ameneties. Housing in these areas varies from very large private dwellings to council house estates, high flats and sheltered homes for the old or infirm. Amenities include outdoor and indoor facilities for athletics, golf, bowls, tennis, swimming and many other interests including a football stadium and dog-racing track. The old and infirm are also catered for with day and evening centres as are the physically and mentally handicapped.
